name: Up Scope
overview:
Up Scope was produced by Grand Productions Inc. in 1986.

Kill the attacking sub hunter while wasting as many ships as possible. If you miss the sub hunter you go into a battle with it. The sub hunter will drop depth charges while you wait to fire a torpedo.

This game utilizes a Commodore Amiga 500 personal computer motherboard with an add-on EPROM daughter board.
